name: Instable Prey
description:
You are a formidable hunter, but the prey in these woods are special. Every few seconds they transform into another beeing. Keep your eyes open or you can become the prey faster then you think.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to play:

  • Score by hunting creatures. 
  • Survive as long as possible.
  • Creatures may transform into something else (indicated by particles around it)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

W A S D to move

LEFT CLLICK to shoot

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Good luck, hunter. You will need it!

---------------------------------------------

Instable Prey was created by 

Sebastian Schulte (Programmer)

---------------------------------------------

Art and sounds are taken by various artists from the itch.io asset-data base. All are free to use. Check em out:

  • Pixel Art Top Down - Basic 32x32 sprites and tilesets for top down games Cainos
  • Shikashi's Fantasy Icons Pack (FREE) 284 icons for your game projects! cheekyinkling
